creator: gthomas.cs02@gtalumni.org
text:
Created attachment 29013
patch to fix bad formatting in documentation for parallel task

The last example in the documentation for the <parallel> task is not formatted in a grey <pre> block like the other examples and this makes it very hard to read.

The fix was simple enough and I have attached a patch based on the latest (revision 1355758) from http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/ant/core/trunk/.

creator: jan@materne.de
text:
Thanks for pointing.
I also unified the use of ' vs. " in that example.


svn rev. 1478661
